summary: Jong-suk and Kyung-min meet up to talk about their high school past, it's been 15 years since they last talked. It brings up all kinds of memories.
cast: Ik-joon Yang|Oh Jeong-Se|Hye-na Kim|Kkobbi Kim|Hee-bon Park
keywords: animal abuse|pig|suicide by jumping|humiliation|murder disguised as suicide
title: Dwae-ji-ui wang
